name: String Thing
description:
Use your elastic body and pointy ears to split enemies and clear stages. Though be careful! You're vulnerable from the head down, so don't stretch yourself too thin.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys / WASD / Numpad 8462 - Move
  • Hold up to stretch, stretch into enemies to defeat them
  • Hold left / right while stretching to turn that direction
  • Space / Shift / Z / Numpad 5 - Confirm in menus
  • Escape / Numpad 7 - Pause

Credits:

  • Programming (and game design) by sarn.
  • Art (and game design) by THX.
  • Sounds from the official Nokia 3310 jam resources page by Trix.

Made in about 2.5 days for NOKIA 3310 JAM 4.
